text: Tom Ruggles (born 25 April 1992) is a former professional Australian rules footballer who played for the Geelong Football Club in the Australian Football League (AFL). He was drafted by the Geelong Football Club with their third selection and forty-fourth overall in the 2016 rookie draft. He made his debut in the sixty-nine point win against the in round 3, 2016 at Simonds Stadium. He was delisted by Geelong at the conclusion of the 2017 season. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Geelong Football Club players Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia)
title: Tom Ruggles
